str2: No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From chora; to be in space, i.e. to pass, enter, or to hold, admit.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Masculine Plural
Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
